title: Verify adding and removing EB under Access Method and Browser in RTP policy page
custom_steps:
Policies -> Real-Time Protection -> New Policy

Select "Enterpriser Browser"  from the Access Method
Click on x in "Enterpriser Browser" to remove under Access Method
Select "Netskope-Enterprise-Browser" from Browser
Click on x in "Netskope-Enterprise-Browser" to remove under Browser
custom_expected: "Enterpriser Browser" and "Netskope-Enterprise-Browser"  should be able to add and remove from the option
